question: How do I create an account?
answer: To create an account, click on 'Sign Up' in the top right corner. Enter your email address, choose a password, and verify your email address through the confirmation link we'll send you.

question: How do I sign up?
answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button on our homepage, enter your email and password, and follow the verification steps sent to your email.

question: How do I log in?
answer: Go to the login page and enter your email address and password. If you've forgotten your password, click 'Forgot Password' to reset it.

question: I can't log in to my account
answer: If you're having trouble logging in, first check that you're using the correct email and password. If you've forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link. If the problem persists, contact our support team.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link. Click the link in the email to create a new password.

question: How do I change my password?
answer: To change your password, go to Settings > Security > Change Password. Enter your current password, then your new password twice to confirm. Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

question: How do I change my email address?
answer: To change your email address, go to Settings > Account > Email. Enter your new email address and click 'Update Email'. You'll receive a verification email at your new address to confirm the change.

question: How do I update my email?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Account > Email Address. Enter your new email and verify it through the confirmation email we'll send.

question: How do I change my username?
answer: To change your username, navigate to Settings > Profile > Username. Enter your desired new username and click 'Save Changes'. Note that usernames must be unique and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

question: Can I change my username?
answer: Yes, you can change your username by going to Settings > Profile > Username. Keep in mind that usernames must be unique, so your desired username might not be available if someone else is using it.

question: How do I update my profile?
answer: You can update your profile by going to Settings > Profile. From there, you can edit your name, bio, profile picture, and other personal information. Don't forget to click 'Save' when you're done.

question: How do I upload a profile picture?
answer: Go to Settings > Profile > Profile Picture. Click 'Upload' and select an image from your device. The image will be automatically resized and cropped to fit.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: To delete your account, go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be removed within 30 days.

question: How do I deactivate my account?
answer: You can temporarily deactivate your account by going to Settings > Account > Deactivate Account. You can reactivate it anytime by logging back in.

question: How do I verify my email?
answer: After signing up, check your email inbox for a verification email. Click the verification link in the email to verify your account. If you didn't receive it, check your spam folder or request a new verification email.

question: I didn't receive the verification email
answer: Check your spam or junk folder first. If you still don't see it, wait a few minutes and check again. You can also request a new verification email from the login page.

question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
answer: To enable two-factor authentication (2FA), go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. Choose your preferred method (SMS or authenticator app) and follow the setup instructions. We highly recommend enabling 2FA for added security.

question: How do I set up 2FA?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. You can choose between SMS text messages or an authenticator app like Google Authenticator. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete setup.

question: How do I disable two-factor authentication?
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication and click 'Disable'. You'll need to enter your password and confirm the action.

question: What is two-factor authentication?
answer: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an extra layer of security to your account. After entering your password, you'll need to provide a second verification code sent to your phone or generated by an authenticator app.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for orders over $1000.

question: How do I update my payment method?
answer: Go to Settings > Billing > Payment Methods. Click 'Add New Payment Method' or 'Edit' next to an existing method to update it.

question: How do I change my credit card?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Billing > Payment Methods. Click 'Edit' next to your current card and enter your new card details.

question: Where can I find my invoices?
answer: All your invoices are available in Settings > Billing > Invoices. You can view, download, or email any invoice from this page.

question: How do I download my invoice?
answer: Go to Settings > Billing > Invoices. Find the invoice you need and click the 'Download' button. You'll receive a PDF copy of the invoice.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: You can request a refund within 30 days of purchase. Please contact our support team with your order number, and we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days.

question: How do I request a refund?
answer: Contact our support team with your order number and reason for the refund request. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after approval.

question: How long do refunds take?
answer: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after approval. The funds will appear in your account within 10-14 business days, depending on your bank.

question: Can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time by going to Settings > Billing > Cancel Subscription. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: Go to Settings > Billing > Manage Subscription and click 'Cancel Subscription'. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

question: Will I get a refund if I cancel?
answer: If you cancel during your billing period, you'll continue to have access until the period ends. Refunds for unused time are available only for annual subscriptions canceled within 30 days.

question: How do I upgrade my plan?
answer: To upgrade your account, go to Settings > Billing > Upgrade Plan. Choose the plan that suits your needs and complete the payment process. Your upgrade will take effect immediately.

question: How do I downgrade my plan?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Billing > Manage Subscription > Change Plan. Select a lower tier plan. The change will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

question: What's the difference between plans?
answer: Our plans differ in features, storage space, and number of users. Visit our Pricing page to see a detailed comparison of all available plans.

question: How do I see my billing history?
answer: All your billing history is available in Settings > Billing > Billing History. You can view past payments, invoices, and subscription changes.

question: When will I be charged?
answer: You'll be charged on the same date each month (or year for annual plans) based on when you first subscribed. You can see your next billing date in Settings > Billing.

question: I was charged twice
answer: If you notice a duplicate charge, please contact our billing support immediately. We'll investigate and issue a refund if it's confirmed to be an error.

question: How do I add a promo code?
answer: During checkout, look for the 'Promo Code' or 'Discount Code' field. Enter your code and click 'Apply' to see the discount reflected in your total.

question: My promo code isn't working
answer: Make sure the code hasn't expired and that you meet all the requirements (plan type, new customer, etc.). If it still doesn't work, contact support with the code.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes, we offer student discounts. Verify your student status through our student verification program to receive a discount on eligible plans.

question: The website is not loading
answer: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, then refresh the page. If the problem persists, try a different browser or check if our service status page shows any known issues.

question: I'm getting an error message
answer: Note the exact error message you're seeing and when it occurs. Try refreshing the page or logging out and back in. If it continues, contact support with the error details.

question: The page keeps crashing
answer: Clear your browser cache, disable browser extensions, and try again. If it still crashes, try using a different browser or device.

question: How do I clear my browser cache?
answer: In Chrome: Settings > Privacy > Clear browsing data. In Firefox: Options > Privacy > Clear Data. In Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data > Remove All.

question: The app won't open
answer: Make sure you have the latest version installed. Try restarting your device, or uninstall and reinstall the app. Check that your device meets the minimum system requirements.

question: I can't upload files
answer: Check that your file size is under the limit (usually 100MB). Ensure the file type is supported. Try a different browser if the problem persists.

question: What file types are supported?
answer: We support common file types including PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4, and more. Check the upload page for a complete list.

question: What's the maximum file size?
answer: The maximum file size is 100MB per file. For larger files, consider compressing them or using our file sharing service.

question: The video won't play
answer: Check your internet connection. Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. Ensure your browser supports HTML5 video playback.

question: Audio is not working
answer: Check your device's volume settings and ensure nothing is muted. Try refreshing the page or using a different browser. Check that your browser has permission to play audio.

question: I can't download files
answer: Check your browser's download settings and ensure pop-ups aren't blocked. Try right-clicking the download link and selecting 'Save As'. Clear your browser cache if needed.

question: The search isn't working
answer: Try refreshing the page or clearing your search. Check your internet connection. If specific searches aren't working, try different keywords.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: Go to Help > Report a Bug or contact our support team. Include details about what you were doing when the bug occurred, your browser/device, and any error messages.

question: The site looks broken
answer: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies. Disable browser extensions that might interfere. Try a different browser to see if the issue persists.

question: I'm seeing a 404 error
answer: The page you're looking for may have been moved or deleted. Try navigating from the homepage or use the search function to find what you need.

question: I'm seeing a 500 error
answer: This is a server error on our end. Please try again in a few minutes. If it persists, contact our support team with details about what you were doing.

question: The page is loading slowly
answer: Check your internet connection speed. Try closing other tabs or applications. Clear your browser cache. If it's consistently slow, contact support.

question: Nothing happens when I click buttons
answer: Try refreshing the page. Clear your browser cache. Disable browser extensions. If using a mobile device, try the desktop version.

question: The form won't submit
answer: Check that all required fields are filled out correctly. Ensure you have an internet connection. Try refreshing the page and submitting again.

question: I can't see images
answer: Check your internet connection. Try refreshing the page. Disable ad blockers or browser extensions that might block images. Clear your browser cache.

question: How do I use this feature?
answer: Navigate to the feature in the main menu. Click on it to open, and you'll see instructions or a tutorial. You can also check our Help section for detailed guides.

question: What does this feature do?
answer: This feature allows you to [function]. You can access it from [location]. For more details, check our documentation or contact support.

question: How do I enable notifications?
answer: Go to Settings > Notifications. Toggle on the types of notifications you want to receive. You can customize email, push, and in-app notifications.

question: How do I turn off notifications?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Notifications and toggle off the notification types you don't want. You can also set quiet hours to pause notifications during specific times.

question: How do I customize my dashboard?
answer: Click the 'Customize' button on your dashboard. Drag and drop widgets to rearrange them, or add/remove widgets from the available options.

question: How do I change the theme?
answer: Go to Settings > Appearance > Theme. Choose from light, dark, or auto (follows system settings). Your preference will be saved automatically.

question: How do I change the language?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Language. Select your preferred language from the dropdown menu. The interface will update immediately.

question: How do I export my data?
answer: Go to Settings > Privacy > Export Data. Click 'Request Export' and we'll prepare your data. You'll receive an email with a download link when it's ready.

question: How do I import data?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Data > Import. Select the file you want to import and follow the on-screen instructions. Make sure your file is in the correct format.

question: How do I share content?
answer: Click the 'Share' button on any content. Choose how you want to share (link, email, social media) and follow the prompts. You can set privacy levels for shared content.

question: How do I create a folder?
answer: Click the 'New' button and select 'Folder'. Enter a name for your folder and press Enter. You can drag and drop items into folders to organize them.

question: How do I delete a folder?
answer: Right-click on the folder and select 'Delete', or select it and press the Delete key. Confirm the deletion. Note: This will also delete all items inside the folder.

question: How do I organize my files?
answer: You can create folders, use tags, or sort files by name, date, or type. Drag and drop files to move them between folders.

question: How do I search for something?
answer: Use the search bar at the top of the page. Type keywords related to what you're looking for. You can use filters to narrow down results.

question: How do I filter results?
answer: After performing a search, use the filter options on the left sidebar. You can filter by date, type, author, tags, and more.

question: How do I sort my results?
answer: Click the 'Sort' dropdown above your results. Choose to sort by relevance, date, name, or other available options.

question: How do I bookmark something?
answer: Click the bookmark icon on any item you want to save. Access your bookmarks later from the Bookmarks section in your profile.

question: How do I create a template?
answer: Go to Templates > Create New Template. Design your template, add placeholders, and save it. You can use templates to quickly create new items.

question: How do I use templates?
answer: When creating a new item, click 'Use Template' and select from your saved templates. The template will be applied, and you can customize it as needed.

question: How do I set up automation?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Automation. Click 'Create Rule' and define the trigger conditions and actions. Test your automation before activating it.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and going to Orders > Order History. Click on the order you want to track to see detailed shipping information and tracking number.

question: Where is my order?
answer: Log into your account and go to Orders to see the status of your order. If you have a tracking number, you can also check it on the carrier's website.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 business days) and overnight shipping options are also available at checkout.

question: What shipping options are available?
answer: We offer standard (5-7 days), express (2-3 days), and overnight shipping. International shipping times vary by destination country.

question: How much does shipping cost?
answer: Shipping costs vary by destination and shipping method. You'll see the exact shipping cost at checkout before completing your order.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping times and costs vary by destination. Check our shipping page for details.

question: Can I change my shipping address?
answer: If your order hasn't shipped yet, you can change your shipping address by going to Orders > Order Details > Edit Address. Once shipped, contact support immediately.

question: I entered the wrong address
answer: If the order hasn't shipped, you can update it in your order details. If it's already shipped, contact support immediately - we may be able to intercept the package.

question: Can I cancel my order?
answer: You can cancel your order if it hasn't shipped yet. Go to Orders > Order Details > Cancel Order. Once shipped, you'll need to return it for a refund.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: Go to Orders > Order Details > Return Item. Select the items you want to return and the reason. We'll send you a return label and instructions.

question: What's your return policy?
answer: You can return items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Some items may be subject to restocking fees.

question: How long do returns take?
answer: Once we receive your return, we'll process it within 5-7 business days. Your refund will appear in your account within 10-14 business days.

question: Do you offer free returns?
answer: Yes, we offer free returns on most items. Check the product page or your order details to confirm if your item is eligible for free returns.

question: My package is damaged
answer: If your package arrives damaged, take photos and contact support immediately. We'll send a replacement or issue a full refund.

question: I received the wrong item
answer: Contact support with your order number and photos of what you received. We'll send you the correct item and arrange for return of the incorrect one.

question: My order is missing items
answer: Check your order confirmation email to verify what should have been included. If items are missing, contact support with your order number.

question: Can I add items to my order?
answer: If your order hasn't shipped, you may be able to add items. Contact support with your order number and the items you want to add.

question: Can I combine multiple orders?
answer: We can't combine orders after they're placed, but you can contact support to see if we can coordinate shipping to save on costs.

question: How do I get a refund?
answer: Go to Orders > Order Details > Request Refund. Select the reason and submit. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after approval.

question: When will I get my refund?
answer: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return. The funds will appear in your account within 10-14 business days.

question: How do I keep my account secure?
answer: Use a strong, unique password, enable two-factor authentication, never share your login credentials, and be cautious of phishing emails.

question: I think my account was hacked
answer: Change your password immediately. Enable two-factor authentication if you haven't already. Check your account activity for any unauthorized actions and contact support.

question: How do I report suspicious activity?
answer: Contact our security team immediately if you notice any suspicious activity on your account. Include details about what you observed and when it occurred.

question: What should I do if I see a phishing email?
answer: Don't click any links or provide information. Forward the email to our security team and delete it. We'll investigate and take appropriate action.

question: How do you protect my data?
answer: We use industry-standard encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest. See our Privacy Policy for full details.

question: Can you see my password?
answer: No, we never store passwords in plain text. All passwords are encrypted using secure hashing algorithms. Even our staff cannot see your password.

question: Who can see my information?
answer: Only you can see your personal information. We don't sell your data to third parties. See our Privacy Policy for details on how we handle your information.

question: How do I delete my data?
answer: Go to Settings > Privacy > Delete Data. You can delete specific data types or request complete account deletion, which removes all your data within 30 days.

question: What data do you collect?
answer: We collect information you provide (name, email, etc.), usage data, and technical information. See our Privacy Policy for a complete list of what we collect and why.

question: Can I opt out of data collection?
answer: You can opt out of optional data collection in Settings > Privacy > Data Collection. Some data collection is necessary for the service to function.

question: How do I change my privacy settings?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Privacy. Here you can control what information is visible, who can contact you, and what data is collected.

question: How do I make my profile private?
answer: Go to Settings > Privacy > Profile Visibility. Select 'Private' to make your profile visible only to you, or customize who can see specific information.

question: How do I block someone?
answer: Go to the user's profile and click the three-dot menu. Select 'Block User'. Blocked users cannot contact you or see your content.

question: How do I report a user?
answer: Go to the user's profile, click 'Report', and select the reason. Our moderation team will review the report and take appropriate action.

question: What happens when I report someone?
answer: Our moderation team reviews all reports. If a violation is found, we may warn, suspend, or ban the user depending on the severity of the violation.

question: How do I unblock someone?
answer: Go to Settings > Privacy > Blocked Users. Find the user you want to unblock and click 'Unblock'.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes, we use PCI-compliant payment processors. We never store your full credit card number. All payment information is encrypted and secure.

question: How do I enable login alerts?
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Login Alerts. Enable email or push notifications to be alerted when someone logs into your account from a new device.

question: I got a login alert I didn't make
answer: Change your password immediately and enable two-factor authentication. Contact our security team with details about the alert.

question: How do I see my login history?
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Login History. You'll see a list of recent logins with device, location, and time information.
